thread.title: Arsenal offers no certainty on Arsene Wenger's future as manager
thread.title_full: Arsenal offers no certainty on Arsene Wenger's future as manager

author: AP
title: Arsenal offers no certainty on Arsene Wenger's future as manager
text:
Arsenal offers no certainty on Arsene Wenger's future as manager Wenger, who last won the Premier League 13 years ago, has yet to say whether he wants to prolong a reign that started in 1996. Post to Facebook Arsenal offers no certainty on Arsene Wenger's future as manager Wenger, who last won the Premier League 13 years ago, has yet to say whether he wants to prolong a reign that started in 1996.  //usat.ly/2moYOst   Arsenal offers no certainty on Arsene Wenger's future as manager AP Published 8:12   | Updated 58 minutes ago Arsenal failed to reach the Champions League quarterfinals for the seventh consecutive season. (Photo: Ian Kington, AFP/Getty Images) 98   
LONDON (AP) — Arsenal has issued a rare statement on Arsene Wenger's future that gives no indication whether he will still be manager next season. 
Supporters protested against Wenger as Arsenal was eliminated from the Champions League by Bayern Munich on Tuesday. 
On Arsenal's website, chairman Chips Keswick says "we respect that fans are entitled to their different individual opinions but we will always run this great football club with its best long-term interests at heart." 
Wenger, who last won the Premier League 13 years ago, has yet to say whether he wants to prolong a reign that started in 1996. 
Keswick says "Arsene has a contract until the end of the season. Any decisions will be made by us mutually and communicated at the right time in the right way."
